Uses of Class
quadrillion.QCoordinate

    • Uses of QCoordinate in quadrillion

      Methods in quadrillion that return types with arguments of type QCoordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<QCoordinate> QGrid.getBlockers()
      Returns the coordinates of the blocking tiles of the active face of the grid.
      java.util.List<QCoordinate> QPiece.getPieceCoordinates()
      Returns a list of the coordinates which the piece occupies, in local coordinates.
      java.util.List<QCoordinate> QBoard.getWorldCoordinateOfBlockers()
      Returns the coordinates of the blocking coordinates in the coordinate system of the board.
      java.util.List<QCoordinate> QBoard.getWorldCoordinates()
      Returns the explicit list of coordinates of the board.
      Methods in quadrillion with parameters of type QCoordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean QGame.placePieceAt(QPiece piece, QCoordinate location)
      Places a piece at a specified location on the board, such that the (0,0) coordinate of the piece fits that particular location.
      boolean QGame.removePieceAt(QCoordinate location)
      Removes a piece occupying a particular coordinate on the game board.
      Constructor parameters in quadrillion with type arguments of type QCoordinate 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a grid given the blocking tiles on each face.
